Title: To realise the great juvenation of the Chinese nation is presently the greatest dream of the Chinese nation. This is the dream of a strong nation, and when we talk of every single Chinese, it is our own dream
Publisher: Jiefangjun zong zhengzhibu xuanchuanwei (解放军总政治部宣传委)
Notes: Published by the Propaganda Committee of the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army.
